title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Learning Analytics-Integrated Science Education Design Capability Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Expertise in Scientific Fields and Basic LMS (Learning Management System) Proficiency
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activity sequences for STEM subjects by applying an instructional design framework integrated with learning analytics (LA) elements
A digital curriculum can be developed that integrates learning objectives (LO), task design, analytical metrics, and feedback mechanisms.
Improvements to science education design can be proposed using Learning Analytics-integrated Curriculum Component Design Patterns (LA-CCDP).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
